entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NOT AS COOL
MORE HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
